The Cheetah That Couldn't Run - A Virtual Reality Adventure: In this idea, the player takes on the role of a cheetah named "Chester" who has lost his running abilities due to an injury. The game takes place in a virtual reality world where Chester must navigate through obstacles and challenges to find a way to regain his speed. Along the way, the player will encounter other animals who will offer help and support, and the player must use problem-solving skills to overcome challenges.

The Cheetah That Couldn't Run - A Mobile Game: In this idea, the player takes on the role of Chester, a cheetah who has been dealt a bad hand in life. The game has a unique art style and a fun and engaging storyline.

The game has a unique mechanic where the player must use their cards to overcome challenges and obstacles.
